tags: None
review: Listened to all issues very patiently and spoke in very friendly manner. Gave right advice and treatment. Very satisfied with the experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went to have a check up for my new born baby girl. She was having a lot of stomach pain and crying non stop. We found Dr. Ram by practo app and thought of discussing with him. 

There are a very few doctors present with such patience, humbleness and soft tone. He listened to all of our details thoroughly. Explained everything related to feeding of baby, how to keep her healthy etc. Once you speak to him you can experience how an ideal doctor should be. We are highly satisfied and recommend him for any paediatric issues.

tags: None
review: We came to Hyderabad in March 2016 and I was looking for a good Pediatrician in Kondapur area for my 8 month old Son. One colleague Suggested Doctor Rajesh and we have been going there ever since. He is very helpful, he listens to the problems patiently, avoids unnecessary medications and gives good treatment. I strongly recommend Dr Rajesh if any one wants to see a Pediatrician. I am giving this recommendation because it is the least I can do for this very good doctor and all children deserve a good doctor

tags: None
review: Dr. Ram Reddy garu is very effectively communicate to the parents. He has incredible amount of patience. Despite how grumpy and scared, the child may be, he sits down and talk with your kid in a non-threatening and kind-hearted way. He conveys the important information in an effective and non-worrisome way. Ram Reddy sir and staff put parents at ease, ensuring their hospitality through means of effective communication. Thank you sir for your patience and the treating my daughter with utmost care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Rami Reddy has been a great support while my son was suffering with stomach infection/ gastritis. He has been very patient in terms of hearing our concerns and at the same time patiently explained all the possible causes, about the treatment and then about the precautions to be taken. He was also very much available on phone after consultation when the child didn't respond to the medication initially.I can't thank you enough for the support but the least I can do is to recommend you to the parents around Kondapur area, who are looking out for a good pediatrician.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Rami Reddy is very friendly and will listen all our complaints in details before prescribing treatment. Visited the doc for kid 3 yrs Viral fever. Doctor explained the problem very well and suggested good medication and diet. There was no much waiting or delay at the hospital and doctor addressed us on time as per our booking slot. Much recommend doctor for kids.

tags: None
review: We shifted to Hyderabad last year in December and in 1 year I have consulted the doctor several times for my 2 year old son. Dr Rajesh is excellent. He doesn't promote unnecessary medication and avoids antibiotics. He listens to the problem in detail and explains all aspects properly. We have lot of trust in his medication and even after shifting far from the clinic ( kondapur) we still go to him whenever our kid requires medication.

tags: None
review: The  doctor lacks punctuality. Had to wait 45 mins before being told that the doctor would  take another 15 mins.  The whole purpose of booking slot is defeated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi,

I was looking for a  good doctor who could treat the kid with more care; talk to us with patients; explaining the details; and most importantly can suggest the right treatment.  and I found all these good qualities in Mr. Rajesh reddy.  I continued taking my kid to him and get all the vaccinations done (for all 5-6 years).  Such as nice doctor he was and the satisfaction we get every time we go to him is truly value for the amount spent.  Thanks for providing an opportunity to share my experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very Good dr in this kondapur area.he gives exact medicine.he never prescribes 4-5 unnecessary medicine.if required then only he prescribes.i follow only one dr for my son , if I'm out of town then only I have to go the other Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: In times of crisis when people are going out of way to help others, this doctor refused to help for my 1.5 year old daughter. She had fever, was vomiting and when we reached to seek help he outrightly refused. Moreover, he was rude and arrogant in conversation. What is the point of showing a doctor who refuses to help during emergency. Do not recommend him at all. **** * ****** **** ****** ****** *** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
No doubt, doctor is excellent in all aspects.He is the best human being. I visited him for multiple reasons for my child.

Suggestion- It would be good if doctor charges concessional rates on vaccines and not MRP so that benefits gets passed on to the parents and child. Not all families can afford costly vaccines.
